title: Homa Abedine admitted in the brother's e-mail that she was a Muslim infiltrator?
subtitle: A look at a misleading effort to discredit Hillary Clinton's candidacy by making it seem that her first assistant admitted that he was an extremist Muslim plant.
author: David Emery
vclaim: An e-mail written by Hillary Clinton, Homa Abedine's assistant, reveals to her brother that she is an extremist Islamic factory awaiting control of the country after Clinton's election.
